how_decide_shop: How Did You Decide to Shop Today?
enter_cart: Place the cart in CartX (do not enter yourself) and wait for the system to detect the products
enter_basket: Place the basket in CartX (do not enter yourself) and wait for the system to detect the products
enter_products_hand: Enter CartX with the products in hand and wait for the system to detect them
go_secondary_screen_cart: Push the cart out of CartX and head to the secondary screen
go_secondary_screen_basket: Push the basket out of CartX and head to the secondary screen
go_secondary_screen_hand: Head to the secondary screen to continue with the process
